meanings.sent1: The compressibilities of the foam mattress allowed it to be rolled up for easy storage.
meanings.sent2: The compressibilities of the sponge made it easy to squeeze out excess water.
meanings.sent3: The compressibilities of the marshmallow made it a fun challenge to see how small it could get.
meanings.sent4: The compressibilities of the snow under our feet felt like walking on a giant pillow.
meanings.sent5: The compressibilities of the rubber band were tested as it stretched to its limit.

meanings.definition: The degree to which a substance can be compressed.
meanings.sent1: The compressibilities of the air in the balloon determined how much it could be squished.
meanings.sent2: The compressibilities of the box allowed us to fit more items inside.
meanings.sent3: The compressibilities of the pillow made it perfect for adjusting to different sleeping positions.
meanings.sent4: The compressibilities of the spring symbolized the flexibility needed to adapt to change.
meanings.sent5: The compressibilities of the sponge were evident as it shrank in size when pressed.
